answers.answer: It could just be ur blood pressure or maybe diabetes have u gotten tested for that? Also it can be migraines but idk if u suffer from that I've had a history of Hbp but I haven't had a problem with it through out my pregnancy and I've Done the 24hr urine collection for my protein and the first one was normal the second one came out a lil high but I'm being induce at 38weeks which is this Sunday I've been having blurry visions lately too but I have an appointment in a few days oh also I've never had problems with my sugar and neither my migraine so idk why I've been seeing blurry but anyways good luck and u should tell ur dr whys going on and ur concerns good Luck and wish u well...

This happens to me. I'll post the info my OB has posted online about it. It's really common, and I've actually passed out from it. If you're having migraines and swelling along with protein in your urine and high bp...then it's preeclampsia.Many pregnant women complain of dizziness and lightheadedness throughout their pregnancies. Fainting is rare but does happen even in some healthy pregnant women. There are many reasons for these symptoms. The growth of more blood vessels in early pregnancy, the pressure of the expanding uterus on blood vessels and the body's increased need for food all can make a pregnant woman feel lightheaded and dizzy.To feel better follow these tips:Stand up slowly.When you're feeling lightheaded, lay down on your left side.Avoid sitting or standing in one position for a long time.Eat healthy snacks or small meals frequently.Don't get overheated.Call your doctor as soon as possible if you faint. Dizziness or lightheadedness can be discussed at regular prenatal visits.

I did the 1hr sugar test an it came back normal, I dont suffer from migraines the odd time i get a mild headache which is more then tolerable. Ive never had a problem with my bp before getting pregnant an so far havnt been told i do now.Good luck with your induction sunday,  I'll deffinetly be talking to my doctor tomorrow was just hoping to get some kind of potential awnsers tonight

question: Hi ladies so since about 28-29 weeks If im standing for any amount of time, exspecially if its in one spot My vision goes splotchy or i get tunnel vision, I feel super hot an sweaty as well as very weak like im going to faint gets hard to breath an i feel like my chest is beat out of my chest to the point i can hear my heartbeat in my ears The only thing that seems to help is cold air blowing on me which doesnt make it go away just makes it tolerable If i want it to go away i have to go an lye down an take a nap since this first began it seems to have only gotten MUCH more frequent an worse.my doctor has always said my blood pressure as been normal but shes never actualy told me numbers im 32 weeks now but at my last appt ( at 30wks) i was weighing 27pounds up from my pre preg weight which she said isnt bad but it isnt good either... Shes never had me use the bathroom so she could check for protein either.. I see her tomorrow at 12 an im going to be bringing all this up but my question is do you ladys think this could be a sign of pre eclamsia or just part of pregnancy? my hubby nor i understand whats going on with me its gotten to the point were im scared to get off the couch an do anything
title: Pre eclampsia?
